conveyorbelt.name: Conveyorbelt
conveyorbelt.description: The easyest and most common way to transport Items.

collector.name: Collector
collector.description: Puts any Items it gets into your Inventory so you can sell them.

saw.name: Saw
saw.description: Cuts 5 Logs in to 4 Planks. Works only if it contains 5 Log. Can also cut Planks into Sawdust. It works fast!

warehouse.name: Warehouse
warehouse.description: Sells items of one type automaticly from your Inventory. You can define a ammount that gets holdback. Can sell up to 500 items per interval.

siev.name: Siev
siev.description: Sieves 9 Soil into 3 Quartz Sand, 3 Concret and 3 Dirt.

charcoalmeiler.name: Charcoal Meiler
charcoalmeiler.description: Requieres 10 Planks to burn them down to 5 Charcoal.

advancedcharcoalmeiler.name: Advanced Charcoal Meiler
advancedcharcoalmeiler.description: Requieres 10 Planks to burn them down to 5 Charcoal. Creates Charcoaldust every 4th time.

briquettepress.name: Briquettepress
briquettepress.description: Requieres 5 Charcoaldust to press them into Briquettes.

cokery.name: Cokery
cokery.description: Burns 15 Charcoal into 15 Coke. Requieres 2 Briquettes or 2 Coke.

papermanufactory.name: Paper Manufactory
papermanufactory.description: Uses 10 Sive and 100 Sawdust to create 10 Rawpaper

weaver.name: Weaver
weaver.description: Makes a Siev out of 5 Planks. Puts together Sievs and Paper/Rawpaper to make filter.

blastfurnacelower.name: Blast Furnace (Lower Part)
blastfurnacelower.description: Melts 40 Iron Ore with 10 Coke to create 35 Raw Iron. Requieres a upper part to work.

smith.name: Smith
smith.description: Build a Pickaxe out of 1 Steel and 1 Plank.

blastfurnaceupper.name: Blast Furnace (Upper Part)
blastfurnaceupper.description: Is requiered to put on the lower Blast Furnace Part.

cruciblefurnace.name: Crucible Furnace
cruciblefurnace.description: Enriches 35 Rawiron with 5 Iron Ore into 40 Steel.

simpleminer.name: Simple Miner
simpleminer.description: Mines ores and minerals on depth 1.

filterleft.name: Item Filter (left)
filterleft.description: Puts a selected Item to the left and all other straight.

teleporterinput.name: teleporterinput
teleporterinput.description: Puts a selected Item to the left and all other straight.

teleporteroutput.name: teleporteroutput
teleporteroutput.description: Puts a selected Item to the left and all other straight.

filterright.name: Item Filter (right)
filterright.description: Puts a selected Item to the right and all other straight.

precisionspliterleft.name: Precision Spliter (Left)
precisionspliterleft.description: Pushes every N'th Item to the left.

precisionspliterright.name: Precision Spliter (Right)
precisionspliterright.description: Pushes every N'th Item to the right.

clickToSell: Click on items to sell them.
clickToBuyFactory: Click on a Factory to Buy.
